ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: RLST 801 offers information about ancient Israelite religion, via archeology and comparative religions.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I am most happy that I took this course because it exposed me to material from the Ancient Near East that I had no previous experience with. This is the only course that I have taken at YDS that has exposed me so thoroughly to that comparative material.
This course provided a greater understanding of the historical context in which to set Israel and the Biblical texts.
